name: The Spa Depot
tag_list: hot-tubs, spas, pool-supplies, hot-tub-covers, spa-accessories, spa-chemical-kits
overview:
Since 1997, The Spa Depot has been offering the highest quality hot tubs and spa supplies at competitive pricing. The Spa Depot maintains the largest inventory and selection of quality spa products in the world, and with such a large inventory, we can pass along great savings to our customers. We feature a huge selection of energy-efficient portable hot tubs.

Here at The Spa Depot, we have been committed to waste stream reduction and conservation long before the term carbon footprint was coined. Going Green is not just a trendy concept. It’s part of our work environment. At The Spa Depot we care that our products are environmentally safe for our planet. We also feel that it is important to give back to the community and we have been proud supporters to; World Vision, the American Red Cross, the Mary Bridge Children’s Foundation and Habitat for Humanity.
